mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( username, email, password_hash, profile_picture_url, bio ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{profilePictureUrl}, #{bio} ) RETURNING user_id
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, email, password_hash, profile_picture_url, bio, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE username = #{username} AND password_hash = #{passwordHash}

SELECT /* selectUserByUserSearch */ u.user_id, u.username, u.email, u.password_hash, u.profile_picture_url, u.bio, u.created_at, u.updated_at, f.follower, f.followee, f.followed_at FROM users u LEFT JOIN follows f ON u.username = f.followee AND f.follower = #{requestingUser} WHERE u.username = #{username}
SELECT /* selectFollow */ follower, followee, followed_at FROM follows WHERE follower = #{follower} AND followee = #{followee}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follows /* insertFollow */ ( follower, followee, followed_at ) VALUES ( #{follower}, #{followee}, now() ) RETURNING followed_at
